channel.title: CVE Feed for Elementor -- Elementor Website Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Elementor -- Elementor Website Builder

item.title: CVE-2023-33922|2024-08-02T15:54:13.430Z -- elementor -- elementor%20website%20builder
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Elementor Elementor Website Builder.This issue affects Elementor Website Builder: from n/a through 3.13.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-37437|2024-07-09T13:44:44.326Z -- elementor -- elementor%20website%20builder
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Elementor Elementor Website Builder allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS), Stored XSS.This issue affects Elementor Website Builder: from n/a through 3.22.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-47504|2024-06-04T17:26:42.705Z -- elementor -- elementor%20website%20builder
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in Elementor Elementor Website Builder allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Elementor Website Builder: from n/a through 3.16.4.

item.title: CVE-2023-33922|2024-06-11T13:17:32.622Z -- elementor -- elementor%20website%20builder
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Elementor Elementor Website Builder.This issue affects Elementor Website Builder: from n/a through 3.13.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-24934|2024-06-04T17:43:24.709Z -- elementor -- elementor%20website%20builder
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Elementor Elementor Website Builder allows Manipulating Web Input to File System Calls.This issue affects Elementor Website Builder: from n/a through 3.19.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-37437|2024-07-09T10:38:55.423Z -- elementor -- elementor%20website%20builder
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Elementor Elementor Website Builder allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS), Stored XSS.This issue affects Elementor Website Builder: from n/a through 3.22.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-37437|2024-08-02T03:57:38.925Z -- elementor -- elementor%20website%20builder
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Elementor Elementor Website Builder allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS), Stored XSS.This issue affects Elementor Website Builder: from n/a through 3.22.1.
